category: General Assembly of Delegates and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 4 (Notice of General Meeting Agenda)
contents: Article 4 (Notification of agenda for general meeting) ① When holding a general meeting, the agenda to be submitted to the meeting after resolution by the Board of Directors must be notified 7 days prior to the opening date. ② When holding an extraordinary general meeting pursuant to Article 17, Paragraph 2 of the Articles of Incorporation, the agenda to be submitted to the meeting must be notified 7 days prior to the opening date. ③ When holding an extraordinary general meeting pursuant to Article 17, Paragraph 3 of the Articles of Incorporation, the person with the authority to convene the general meeting shall prepare and notify the agenda to be submitted to the meeting without delay.
